commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Duke to Rio and add greeting and exit
commitResults.messageBody: Replaces the Duke class and related references with Rio, including updates to README files, test scripts, and expected output. The new Rio class introduces a revised logo and greeting message, reflecting the project's new identity.

commitResults.messageTitle: level-1
Refactor Rio to use Task objects and add Task class
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced a new Task class to encapsulate task data and logic. Refactored Rio to store tasks as Task objects, improved handling of 'bye' and 'list' commands, and enhanced output formatting. This change improves code organization and prepares for future extensibility.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task completion status and refactor Rio logic
commitResults.messageBody: Introduces a boolean status to Task for marking completion, with methods to finish and unfinish tasks. Refactors Rio to handle marking, unmarking, and listing tasks with their status, and removes redundant Task fields for 'bye' and 'list'.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Deadline, Event, and ToDo task types
commitResults.messageBody: Introduces new classes Deadline, Event, and ToDo extending Task, each with custom constructors and string representations. Refactors Rio to support adding and managing these new task types, updates task marking/unmarking logic, and simplifies Task class by removing unused methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update test files for new greeting and input
commitResults.messageBody: Replaces the ASCII art greeting in EXPECTED.TXT with a new Rio assistant message and adds 'bye' to input.txt for updated test coverage.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add command recognition flag to Rio class
commitResults.messageBody: Introduces a recognizeCommand boolean to track if a valid command was processed. Provides user feedback for unrecognized commands and resets the flag after each input loop iteration to improve command handling.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix task indexing and add delete command
commitResults.messageBody: Corrects task indexing by using idx - 1 for finish and unfinish operations to match user-facing numbering. Adds a deleteTask method and integrates it with the command parser to allow users to remove tasks by index.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command handling using enum
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced a Command enum to replace string-based command checks in doTask(). This improves code readability and reduces errors from invalid command strings by leveraging enum type safety and valueOf().

commitResults.messageTitle: Add persistent task storage with DataManager
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced DataManager to handle saving and loading tasks using serialization. Updated Rio to use DataManager for persistent task management, and made Task implement Serializable to support object serialization.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Rio chatbot with modular OOP structure
commitResults.messageBody: Split main logic into Parser, Ui, Storage, and TaskList classes for better separation of concerns and maintainability. Replaced DataManager with Storage, moved UI logic to Ui, and command parsing to Parser. Updated Rio to use new classes and simplified main loop. Added TaskList class for task management.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add package structure
commitResults.messageBody: Moved main classes to the 'rio' package and task-related classes to 'rio.task' for better organization. Updated import statements and references in README and UI output to reflect new package names.

commitResults.messageTitle: Set command handling into separate classes and add date and time handling
commitResults.messageBody: Moved command logic from Ui to individual command classes for better separation of concerns and maintainability. Added DateConverter and TimeConverter utilities for date/time formatting. Updated Parser and Ui to use new command classes. Improved error handling and validation for commands.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/add-gradle-support'
Update build.gradle
Add JUnit tests
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced unit tests for Deadline and ToDo classes to verify their toString() methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move rio.ser to resources and update Storage path
commitResults.messageBody: Relocated rio.ser from src/main/data to src/main/resources/data and updated the Storage class to reference the new path. Also set shadowJar output filename to rio.jar in build.gradle for consistency.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Javadoc comments to classes and methods
commitResults.messageBody: Added detailed Javadoc comments to all main classes, command classes, and task classes to improve code documentation and clarity. This includes descriptions of class responsibilities, method purposes, parameters, and return values, as well as author tags.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add find command to search tasks by keyword
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced FindCommand to allow searching for tasks containing a specified keyword. Updated Parser and Ui to support the new command. Added a contains method to Task for keyword matching. Removed debug output from DeadlineCommand.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-level-9'
Add Javadoc comments to FindCommand methods
commitResults.messageBody: Added Javadoc comments to the FindCommand class and its methods to improve code documentation and clarity for future maintenance.

commitResults.messageTitle: Reformat codebase to follow coding standards
commitResults.messageBody: Renamed methods in Ui, TaskList, Storage, and Task classes for clearer intent (e.g., markAsDone, getTask, getSize). Updated command classes to use new method names and improved error handling. Parser logic now uses more descriptive method calls. Also simplified equals implementations in task subclasses.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-A-CodingStandard'
Refactor FindCommand to use dynamic keyword and TaskList API and apply coding standard to FindCommand
commitResults.messageBody: Updated FindCommand to search using a variable keyword instead of a hardcoded value. Replaced direct list access with TaskList API methods for better encapsulation and consistency.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix JAR file bug
commitResults.messageBody: Storage now uses java.nio.file.Path for file handling and updates the data file location to 'data/rio.ser'. This improves path management and file operations. Added a new binary data file 'data/rio.ser'.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix names
Fix JavaDoc layout and change method names to follow coding standards
commitResults.messageBody: Replaces the 'process' method with 'execute' in all command classes and updates their usage throughout the codebase. Adds missing Javadoc tags and improves code consistency by marking formatters as final. This refactor clarifies command execution semantics and improves maintainability.
